# KEGG examples

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(turnoveR)
```

## Species

```{r}
# available species
species <- fetch_kegg_species()
species
filter(species, str_detect(species, "K-12"))
```


## Pathways

```{r}
# pathways for species
pathways <- fetch_kegg_pathways_for_species(org_code = "eco")
pathways
```

## Pathway Details

```{r}
# additional information for specific pathways
details <- fetch_kegg_pathway_details(c("path:eco01230", "path:eco00020"))
details

# loadsd of informatio in this data frame, e.g. descriptions
details %>% select(description)

# or compounds involved
details %>% unnest(compound) %>% 
   select(entry, compound, pathway_map)
```
